name: NBTElementHelper$NBTNumberHelper
description:
The `NBTNumberHelper` class is a specialized helper for handling NBT numeric tags in JSMacros. It provides type-safe access to numeric NBT data with support for all Minecraft numeric types including bytes, shorts, integers, longs, floats, and doubles. This helper handles automatic conversion between different numeric types while preserving the underlying data precision.

NBT numeric tags are used throughout Minecraft for storing quantitative data such as health, damage levels, experience points, coordinates, durability, enchantment levels, and various game mechanics. This helper class makes it easy to work with these numeric values in your scripts with proper type conversion and precision handling.

methods.name: asLong
methods.description: Returns the numeric value as a 64-bit signed integer.

methods.name: asInt
methods.description: Returns the numeric value as a 32-bit signed integer.

methods.name: asShort
methods.description: Returns the numeric value as a 16-bit signed integer.

methods.name: asByte
methods.description: Returns the numeric value as an 8-bit signed integer.

methods.name: asFloat
methods.description: Returns the numeric value as a 32-bit floating-point number.

methods.name: asDouble
methods.description: Returns the numeric value as a 64-bit floating-point number.

methods.name: asNumber
methods.description: Returns the numeric value as a generic JavaScript Number object.
